verbs.description: impasse looms over victims statute of limitations bill house majority leader david reed vows that his chamber [V: will] reject a senate plan that exempts the catholic church and other institutions from lawsuits attorney democratic caucus of the united states house of representatives senate joseph b scarnati joe scarnati republican party united states gop berks county rep david reed house democratic caucus rep mark rozzi united states senate rep david reed majority leader david reed president indiana county catholic church
